item.title: Docs: Getting Started
item.description:
System requirements

  • Thunderbird 68 or later

Installation

  1. Open Add-ons for Thunderbird site from here.
  2. Download Disable DragAndDrop and install it.

item.title: Docs: Configuration
item.description:
Disable DragAndDrop works without any configuration.
Your mail folder is protected from drag and drop after you installed the add-on.

Options

  • Prompt for approval rather than completely locking down the drag and drop of folders option allows the folder movement if you intended it.
    When the folder is dropped, the approval prompt will be shown. Press OK to move the folder.

item.title: Docs: Disable this add-on temporarily
item.description:
1. Open Add-ons Manager on Thunderbird.
  2. Turn off this add-on.

item.title: Docs: Pricing
item.description: Disable DragAndDrop is an open source software and you can use it without any purchases.
